IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollTokenDescrip: Choose your dice pool. Choose your action. Choose your position. Choose your effect.
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollPartialSucce: You hesitate. Withdraw and try a different approach, or else do it with a minor consequence: a minor complication occurs, you have reduced effect, you suffer lesser harm, you end up in a risky position.
You do it, but there’s a consequence: you suffer harm, a complication occurs, you have reduced effect, you end up in a desperate position.
You do it, but there’s a consequence: you suffer severe harm, a serious complication occurs, you have reduced effect.
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollFailurePosit: You falter. Press on by seizing a risky opportunity, or withdraw and try a different approach.
Things go badly. You suffer harm, a complication occurs, you end up in a desperate position, you lose this opportunity.
It’s the worst outcome. You suffer severe harm, a serious complication occurs, you lose this opportunity for action.
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollZeroMode: Zero Dice rolled - rolling two dice and taking the lowest
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollGreatEffectD:
You get an exceptional result or an extreme effect.

If this is an engagement roll, you've already overcome the first obstacle and are in a controlled position for whatever is next.

If you're marking faction or healing clocks, mark 5 segments.
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollStandardEffe:
You get a good result or full effect.

If this is an engagement roll, you start in a controlled position.

If you're marking faction or healing clocks, mark 3 segments.
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollLimitedEffec:
You get a mixed result or a partial effect.

If this is an engagement roll, you start in a risky position.

If you're marking faction or healing clocks, mark 2 segments.
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.RollPoorEffectDe:
You get a bad result or little effect.

If this is an engagement roll, you start in a desperate position.
Good luck!

If you're marking faction or healing clocks, mark 1 segment.
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.actionsHint: A comma separated list of the actions used by your system
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.maxDiceCountHint: The maximum number of dice available in the popup
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.defaultDiceCount: Default Number of Dice to Roll
The number of dice that will start selected in the popup
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.defaultPositionH: The position that will start selected in the popup
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.defaultEffectHin: The effect that will start selected in the popup
IlluminatedWorldsRoller.backgroundColorH: The background color of the dice results in the chat messages
